Name: Balloons
Abstract: Data previously used in cognitive psychology experiment; 4 data sets represent different conditions of an experiment
RelevantInfo:
There are four data sets representing different conditions of an experiment. All have the same attributes.

a. adult-stretch.data  Inflated is true if age=adult or act=stretch

b. adult+stretch.data  Inflated is true if age=adult and act=stretch

c. small-yellow.data   Inflated is true if (color=yellow and size = small) or

d. small-yellow+adult-stretch.data  Inflated is true if (color=yellow and size = small) or (age=adult and act=stretch)
RelevantPapers:
Pazzani, M. (1991). The influence of prior knowledge on concept acquisition: Experimental and computational results. Journal of Experimental Psychology: Learning, Memory & Cognition, 17, 3,  416-432.
http://rexa.info/paper/99b17b7a6a0f924611880117798f8790618347f0
AttributeInfo:
(Classes Inflated T or F)

Color:             yellow, purple
size:              large, small
act:               stretch, dip
age:               adult, child
inflated:          T, F
